thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 11 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Boeing Announces Global Fleet Care Agreements For Singapore Airlines And Scoot

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Boeing Announces Global Fleet Care Agreements For Singapore Airlines And Scoot

organizations.name: boeing asia pacific aviation services pte ltd

text:
April 11 (Reuters) - Boeing :
* ANNOUNCES GLOBAL FLEET CARE AGREEMENTS FOR SINGAPORE AIRLINES AND SCOOT
* BAPAS WILL PROVIDE ENGINEERING SERVICES, MAINTENANCE PLANNING AND SCHEDULING, AND OPERATION CONTROL CENTER SERVICES
* BAPAS WILL ALSO PROVIDE MATERIALS DEMAND PLANNING AND SPARES SUPPORT FOR AIRLINES
* INTEGRATED BOEING GLOBAL FLEET CARE DEAL FOR SINGAPORE AIRLINES & SCOOT WERE TRANSFERRED TO BOEING ASIA PACIFIC AVIATION SERVICES PTE LTD
* FOLLOWING THE AGREEMENTS, BAPAS IS ANTICIPATED TO SUPPORT MORE THAN 70 BOEING AIRCRAFT WITHIN SINGAPORE AIRLINES GROUP
* BOEING & SIAEC CONFIRMED COMPLETION OF DEALS & PROCESSES NECESSARY TO FULLY ENABLE BAPAS JV Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
